memberdef.definition: typedef UA_Connection(* UA_ConnectClientConnection)(UA_ConnectionConfig localConf, char *endpointUrl, UA_Logger logger)
memberdef.name: UA_ConnectClientConnection

detaileddescription.para: Creates and initialize a Client object

parameterdescription.para: for the new client. You can use UA_ClientConfig_standard which has sane defaults
function pointer to a logger function. See examples/logger_stdout.c for a simple implementation

simplesect.para: return the new Client object
Void
Void

detaileddescription.para: start a connection to the selected server

parameterdescription.para: function. You can use ClientNetworkLayerTCP_connect from examples/networklayer_tcp.h

simplesect.para: Indicates whether the operation succeeded or returns an error code

detaileddescription.para: close a connection to the selected server

simplesect.para: Indicates whether the operation succeeded or returns an error code

detaileddescription.para: renew a secure channel if needed

simplesect.para: Indicates whether the operation succeeded or returns an error code
